results.title: Super Boats
results.brief_description: Come sailing on a worldwide, whirlwing adventure as Beyond 2000 examines the future of life on the ocean waves. A dinghy that flies, the world’s first water-jet propelled private luxury ocean cruiser, and windweapon - a cross between a windsurfer and a hang glider are just three of the amazing discoveries.
results.description: Come sailing on a worldwide, whirlwing adventure as Beyond 2000 examines the future of life on the ocean waves. results.title: Sunstruck
results.creator_credit: James Gilbert, James Grafton, Jack Neary and Immigrant (AU)
results.brief_description: After responding to a New South Wales government advertisement designed to attract teachers from Britain, a shy teacher from Wales is assigned to a one-teacher school in the isolated bush town of Kookaburra Springs. Initially he has problems adjusting to his new life as he struggles to gain respect from his students. Despite resistance he forms a school choir, which travels Sydney to participate in a singing competition. The trip is a success and on their return to Kookaburra Springs he decides to stay on in the town and marry. Primarily a vehicle for British singer and comedian Harry Secombe, the film was shot on location near the New South Wales town of Parkes with a budget of under $400,000. Cast also includes Maggie Fitzgibbon, John Meillon, Peter Whittle, Dawn Lake, Bobby Limb.

results.title: Sacred Heart College for boys (TEFC)
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “A Place Where Books Are Kept”.
Examines new techniques and attitudes towards the total library services in a Catholic boarding school for boys. Emphasises centralised resources, individualised study and production of new teaching aids. Suitable for teacher/tertiary level.

results.title: Woodbridge District School (TEFC)
results.creator_credit: Timothy Read, Chris Noonan and Film Australia
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “A Place Where Books Are Kept”.
This film shows a media-mobile van visiting a school. The crew on the van is shown instructing the staff of the school in a range of audio-visual activities. Some examples of software are shown and various suggestions are given as to their use within the curricula. Suitable for tertiary level and teachers.

results.title: Summer City
results.creator_credit: Christopher Fraser, Phil Avalon and Summer City Productions
results.brief_description: Set in the early 1960’s, four young men take off for a weekend fling in search of girls, surf, and thrills, but encounter fear and death. Stars Mel Gibson, Steve Bisley, John Jarratt and Abigail.
